text: Jasper National Park is a national park in Alberta, Canada. It is the largest national park of the Canadian Rockies in Alberta. Its area is around . It is to the north of Banff National Park and to the west of Edmonton. The park has glaciers of the Columbia Icefield, springs, lakes, waterfalls and mountains. It is part of the Canadian Rocky Mountain Parks World Heritage Site. ==References== Category:1907 establishments in North America Category:1900s establishments in Canada Category:Geography of Alberta Category:National parks in Canada Category:Parks in the Canadian Rockies
title: Jasper National Park
